quotes.text: Every conversation with you brightens my day. I'm grateful to have you in my life.
You have a way of making even the simplest moments special. I cherish our connection.
Meeting you has added so much joy and excitement to my life. I look forward to getting to know you better.
Your absence is stronger to me than the presence of thousands of other people. I'm beginning to think you're just a mythical creature who doesn't actually make phone calls.
I'm grateful for the laughter and genuine connection we've shared so far. Looking forward to more good times ahead.

propose.text: While I may not know what the future holds, I do know that spending time with you brings me immense happiness. I'm excited to continue this journey together.
